About Me

BIO

An environment which will give me some working experience in professional level with some skillful peoplewhose can guide me properly which will satisfy my desire of contributing in this field

Web developer

Frontend developer

In Frontend development, I am working on React. I have basic knowledge on JavaScript, HTML & CSS. I have a project React. It is a burger building app. I work on Firebase the backend support of my application. I use Axios for the http conncetion building. Moveover I am working on Redux, Hooks approach too. I am also working with nosql like MongoDB.

Machine Learning

Deep learning engineer

I have worked with BJIT, AI division for 8 months. During this time I have assigned two project. One project is based on NLP where I have implenmented Hidden Markov chain for bangla POS taging. Another one is Deep learning approach for generation of images from attributes. I have experience on working-

    Machine learning: linear regression, Logistic regression, Decision tree, Naive bayes, SVM.
    Deep learning: Multilayer perceptron, Convolutional Neural Network, Generative Adversarial Networks, Variational Autoencoder.
